Featured Gear

Kalita Wave 185

The Kalita Wave has proven to be one of our favorite brewing devices in our arsenal, extremely durable and easy to use.

We find it to produce a perfect balance between the cleanliness of a Chemex and the bold flavors an Aeropress offers.

$28.50 Purchase

Affiliate Link Disclosure

Most of the links on this page are Amazon Affiliate Links. Which means if you purchase any piece of gear from a link from this page we get a small kickback from Amazon. The price of the gear is no different to you. This helps us keep the lights on here and another way for you to help support this site. If you need to get an order of new filters for your Chemex or Aeropress, purchase them through the link on this page and you can help us out a little bit. We appreciate you greatly.
